name: Cooler Shooter
description:
This is my first project ever. Please rate it 5 stars if you like it! Made with https://www.construct.net/en!

Gameplay:
WASD - movement
Left click - Shoot
Space - Restart (when died)


Other info: 
New enemies spawn every 1 - (Kills / 150) seconds
Enemies have 5 healt
Bullets damages 1 healt

Patch notes:
(v0.1 - 25. 06. 21) Added WASD movement instead of arrows!
